Title: Daruchini Dwip
Writer: Humayun Ahmed (novel), Humayun Ahmed (dialogue), Humayun Ahmed (screenplay)
Actors: Riaz, Zakia Bari Momo, Mosharraf Karim, Mamnun Hasan Emon
Plot: Story of some university friend's personal life and their ultimate goal to go on a study tour to a coral beach named 'Saint Martin'.
